fields.title: Web Development Course
fields.blurb: This course aims to help you learn how to build simple static websites using HTML and CSS
fields.description: Learn HTML and CSS, the fundamental tools used to build any website. With this knowledge you will have the necessary foundation to learn more advanced concepts of web development.
fields.searchField: web development coursethis course aims to help you learn how to build simple static websites using html and csslearn html and css, the fundamental tools used to build any website. with this knowledge you will have the necessary foundation to learn more advanced concepts of web development.

fields.title: Introduction to JavaScript Fundamentals
fields.blurb: This is an introductory course on the fundamentals of JavaScript
fields.description: In this course we will look at the basics of JavaScript and gradually build up to a point where you are able to write simple code in JavaScript and accomplish some of the basic features necessary to integrate JavaScript into a websites.
fields.searchField: introduction to javascript fundamentalsthis is an introductory course on the fundamentals of javascriptin this course we will look at the basics of javascript and gradually build up to a point where you are able to write simple code in javascript and accomplish some of the basic features necessary to integrate javascript into a websites.

Once you are done, attach the following screenshots:-
1) Show that both the "Coding Keyboard" app and "Acode" app are installed on your phone
2) You should add the code "<html></html>" in the Acode app

Look at the example screenshots below for reference.

fields.title: First HTML File
fields.instructions:
Do the following:-
1) Enter the HTML code shown in the first image titled "Code Sample" into the Acode app and then save it as "Sample.html".
2) After saving the file, take a screenshot of the code in notepad or in the Acode app (if you're on the phone).
3) Preview the HTML code by opening it in the browser or in Acode and take a screenshot of the preview.

Make sure to enter your name, class and school name (SGP/DHA/ERD) there in the code.

Attach both the screenshots and then mark this as done.

If you're on a computer, use Google to learn how to take screenshot of your computer screen without taking photos of it.
fields.searchField:

3) preview the html code by opening it in the browser or in acode and take a screenshot of the preview.

make sure to enter your name, class and school name (sgp/dha/erd) there in the code.

attach both the screenshots and then mark this as done.

if you're on a computer, use google to learn how to take screenshot of your computer screen without taking photos of it.

fields.title: Complete 21% of HTML challenges
fields.instructions: Complete at least 21% of HTML challenges on FreeCodeCamp and attach screenshot of proof.
fields.searchField: complete 21% of html challengescomplete at least 21% of html challenges on freecodecamp and attach screenshot of proof.

fields.title: Common HTML Tags
fields.instructions:
Watch the video:-

English - https://youtu.be/t5iOpoDdIYI

Tamil - https://youtu.be/9UF0E39iS-g

Tasks:-

I) . Create a new HTML file and save it as "Common-tags.html"

II) . The file should contain the basic structure of the HTML file (i.e. with html tag, head tag, title tag, body tag etc. )

III). Inside the body tag, create the following tags with some text inside:-

1) h1

2) h2

3) h3

4) h4

5) h5

6) h6

7) p

8) div

9) i

10) b

11) u

12 ul

13) ol

14) hr

15) span

IV) Attach screenshot of both the HTML code and the preview on your phone.


Use this site as reference if you need to see how a tag is used - https://www.w3schools.com/tags/default.asp

fields.title: Create account in Codepen.io
fields.instructions:
Please watch this video to understand what Codepen.io is and how to use it:-

English - https://youtu.be/YzkpQlTpAT0

Tamil - https://youtu.be/I1EtQ5fK0Wg

The video shows how to create an account on https://codepen.io on your phone. The process is similar for on the computer.

Create your account and add link to your Codepen profile in the private comment and then submit.

Hint: After login, go to the profile page on codepen and copy the URL from the browser and paste here. Please watch the video again if you're not sure what the profile page is.

fields.title: JS Data Types
fields.instructions:
Watch this video to learn about the Data Types in JS

English - https://youtu.be/vfh8A3CJRrk

Tamil - https://youtu.be/VBbVf8rFY1s

Once you've finished watching the video, go to Codepn.io and create a new pen and in the JS window, write JS statements to do the following:-

1. Create a variable to store a number
2. Create a variable to store a string
3. create a variable to store an array
4. create a variable to store an object with at least 3 key value pairs
5. create a function to display all of these variables in separate lines and then call that function at the end.


Watch the video more than once if necessary. Once you complete these 5 tasks listed above, save the pen and paste the link down below and click on submit.

fields.title: HTML Project 1 - Part 2
fields.instructions:
Watch this video to understand what to do:-

English - https://youtu.be/-W5fssri9fk

Tamil - https://youtu.be/f9RKZ_5p_A0

1. Watch the video above carefully
2. Go to the same codepen you used in the HTML Project 1 and add the HTML code necessary to achieve what is described in the video.
3. If you want to use a photo in your phone in the img tag, you should first upload it to the internet and then get a web URL for the image to use in the src attribute of the image tag. You can use this service to upload images - https://imgbb.com. And after uploading the image, click on the Embed Code dropdown and select "HTML full-linked" and then from the box below that copy the link shown in the src attribute. Make sure that the URL you've copied ends with .jpg, that's how you can know that it is an image URL.

After adding your code to the pen, save your changes and add the link to your codepen as a private comment and then mark it as done.

fields.title: CSS Common Properties
fields.instructions:
Please watch this video:-

English - https://youtu.be/kE5hlpXD250

Tamil - https://youtu.be/xrlQ4GQ84mg

Your tasks in this assignment:-
1. Create a new Codepen and create a new HTML document with all the basic tags (html, head, title body etc.)
2. Add the following tags with some text inside - h1, h2, p, span, div, h4, h5, and a few other tags if necessary.
3. Use the following CSS properties in your codepen correctly, as shown in the video.

1) color
2) background-color
3) font-weight
4) font-size
5) text-decoration
6) margin
7) padding
8) width
9) height
10) max-height
11) max-width
12) border

Once you add all the necessary code in the codepen and preview your code, save it and submit the link to the codepen as a private comment.

fields.title: Demo Project 1
fields.instructions:
Watch this video to understand what to do:-

English - https://youtu.be/0J0o92iD5bc

Tamil - https://youtu.be/-MqoTFahODI

If you have been doing your work on Codepen, copy all the code to a file in Acode app and use that to work on the demo projects.

List of changes to achieve:-
1. Your profile page website should contain the following four pages:-
a) Home Page
b) About Page
c) Gallery Page
d) Contact Page
2. There should be a horizontal navigation menu to navigate between these pages easily, as shown in the video.

Just learn to google how to find out things that you don't know. You will need to research on google to complete these tasks.

Complete all these changes in your HTML website on the Acode app and save it and add screenshots of both the code and the preview of your output and then mark it as done.
